body: Humans are sometimes orphaned and adopted by other races. Choose one humanoid race without the human subtype. You start play with that race's languages and gain that race's weapon familiarity racial trait (if any). If the race does not have weapon familiarity, you gain either Skill Focus or Weapon Focus as a bonus feat that is appropriate for that race instead. This racial trait replaces the bonus feat trait.
name: Adoptive Parentage
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Adoptive Parentage
